sentences.english: One of the conspicuous phenomenons of it is full of a lot of English words.
sentences.chinese: 網絡語言中一個突出現象是大量英語外來詞雜糅其中。

sentences.english: New-century fiction shows a kind of mixture of literary narrative and journalistic narrative.
sentences.chinese: 新世紀小說呈現出文學敘事與新聞敘事的雜糅和糾纏。

sentences.english: The Narratological Study about the Narrative Literature of Pushkin;
sentences.chinese: 新世紀小說呈現出文學敘事與新聞敘事的雜糅和糾纏。

sentences.english: Some of our friends may tell us things that have mixtures of truth and fiction at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 朋友可能會跟我們講述真假雜糅的事情。

sentences.english: Yu Bing is a mixture of modern consciousness and traditional virtue.
sentences.chinese: 在於冰的身上，雜糅了現代意識和傳統道德。
